description: Update documentation to reflect pnpm link workflow
context: Updated AGENTS.md and CLAUDE.md to recommend pnpm run link (pnpm link --global) instead of pnpm start or node dist/index.js. Documentation now shows using dex commands directly after linking.
result:
Updated both AGENTS.md and CLAUDE.md Local Development sections:

Before: Recommended 'pnpm start' or 'node dist/index.js <command>'
After: Recommend 'pnpm run link' (which runs pnpm build && pnpm link --global)

Key improvements:
- Setup now uses pnpm run link shortcut
- Examples show using 'dex' commands directly (dex list, dex create)
- Clearer guidance on watch mode workflow (pnpm dev in one terminal, dex commands in another)
- Added note that /dex skill automatically uses local build after linking
- Cleanup uses pnpm run unlink

This makes the local development workflow simpler and aligns with the new convenience scripts in package.json.
